mapper.select: SELECT ledger_entry.id, ledger_entry.uuid, ledger_entry.category_id, ledger_entry.`date`, ledger_entry.`name`, ledger_entry.total, ledger_entry.currency_type, ledger_entry.remark, ledger_entry_detail.id AS detail_id, ledger_entry_detail.uuid AS detail_uuid, ledger_entry_detail.user_id AS detail_user_id, ledger_entry_detail.payment_channel_id AS detail_payment_channel_id, ledger_entry_detail.funded_ratio AS detail_funded_ratio, ledger_entry_detail.amount AS detail_amount, ledger_entry_detail_tag.id AS detail_tag_id, ledger_entry_detail_tag.uuid AS detail_tag_uuid, ledger_entry_detail_tag.tag_id AS detail_tag_tag_id FROM ledger_entry LEFT JOIN ledger_entry_detail ON ledger_entry.uuid = ledger_entry_detail.entry_id LEFT JOIN ledger_entry_detail_tag ON ledger_entry_detail.uuid = ledger_entry_detail_tag.entry_detail_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
